intro: I am Paramjit Singh Bal, an Agriculturist.
I have more than 20 years of experience in Plant Tissue Culture and Drip Irrigation Systems solutions.
We are committed to providing nutrient rich foods and minimizing the impact of agriculture on its environment. As a result, our products have both short-term and long-term benefits to you.
I had the honour of installing such a solution for the Chief Minister of Punjab, Capt. Amarinder Singh.

title: Custom
Tailored

points.title: Maximize Yield
bullets: Creates a perfectly balanced ratio of Air, Water and Nutrients in the root zone.
The result of this is not just pristine quality, but also at a higher yield.

points.title: Maximizes Savings
bullets: Minimise use of herbicides and pesticides.

points.title: Flexible Solutions
bullets: Tailored separately to both corporates and individuals.
Smooth execution for challenging terrain such as hills.
Geared for both open fields and protected cultivations

dripIrrigation.ps: Agronomic support and Excellent post-sales service

df.title: Disease Free Cultivars
df.-: Plants where part of the plant is a seed, gather pathogens from the environment. This increases every generation.

qs.title: Rapid Cultivar Production
qs.-: Plant cultivar is multiplied over the time period of several crop seasons for distribution.
qs.+: Our method can mass produce cultivars from a single bud around the whole year!

sp.title: Resilient Pure Lines
sp.-: Back crossing of the same parent results in weak offspring.
sp.+: We can multiply the cells of a chosen cultivar to maintain strong offspring.
